details.title: Switchable THz Filter Based on a Vanadium Dioxide Layer Inside a Fabry–Pérot Cavity
details.abstract: A terahertz amplitude switching device is proposed which allows for the efficient manipulation of sharp transmission bands. The switching concept is based on the thermally triggered insulator-to-metal transition of a thin vanadium dioxide layer, placed inside a Fabry-Pérot resonator.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
